original_text: Because of this, people were taking pieces of cloth and clothes that Paul gave to them. Paul had used these things, and people took them to those who were ill. After they touched these cloths, the sick people would become well again. Bad spirits also left them.
korean_text: 심지어 사람들이 바울의 몸에서 손수건이나 앞치마를 가져다가 병든 사람에게 얹으면 그 병이 떠나고 악귀도 나가더라

sentences.original_text: Because of this, people were taking pieces of cloth
sentences.korean_translation: 이 때문에 사람들은 천 조각들을 가져가고 있었고

sentences.original_text: and clothes that Paul gave to them
and people took them to those who were ill
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 사람들은 그것들을 아픈 사람들에게 가져갔습니다

sentences.original_text: the sick people would become well again
